alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 10 at 1:29PM MDT until May 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Debeque to Silt Corridor, Central Colorado River Basin and Animas River Basin. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 9 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor
